name: Jimbaran Cliffs Private Hotel & Spa
address: Jl. Gedong Sari II No.888, Benoa, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia
review 1:
Fell in love with this hotel,the service,the view right at the first time. I wish our second time to Bali had such a nice experience we got like we got it here at Jimbaran Cliff Hotel.

Very Helpful and nice staff, amazing infinity pool view, clean room, I love everything about this hotel. If there was a 6 star,I would give it 6 definitely.

Definitely worth every penny. I still remember how they welcomed us with warm welcoming, with amazing Balinese music and excellent service (at 12am or 1am in the morning, yes,you read in right ‚ù§, our flight to Bali arrived in midnight).

Sending love to Jimbaran Cliff Hotel team from America if you guys staff read this. Thank you the team so much for making our trip to Bali such a Never-Forget-Experience. ‚ù§‚ù§
review 2: Disappointing. Pictures and reviews were decent, but there is a lack of attention to details. My request for an airport pickup was never read, I had to call them after I got to Bali. Water is given in small 330ml plastic bottles and only 1 per person per day (yet the hotel claims to be concerned about the environment). The AC dripped into the bed. Outlets were not convenient for bedside charging. The kitchen is unusable, no gas tank and no pots and pans. When I asked the staff, they said that the kitchen is only available if you ask in advance (the OTA booking says there is a kitchen). My shower drain is positioned in such a way that water pools unattractively after you shower. The light over the sink buzzes and the faucets and sinks are set up in such a way that I've sprayed water all over myself multiple times. Food is expensive and mediocre. Luckily I'm on a work trip and barely spending time there. The only plus side is that the pool area and view is nice. Overall, overpriced and barely comfortable and I would not stay there again especially given the wealth of hotel options in Bali!
review 3: Beautiful and secluded location more suited for honeymooners. The deep soaking pool was amazing! Service was a hundred percent. Each villa has it's own private pool and I noticed a public pool area which needed attention. The downside is if you want amenities close by, you won't find much but there is a car from the villa if you need it.
review 4: A nice private hotel located on a cliff; however, it's quite far from the main street. There is a restaurant open 7am-11pm same as a reception desk. Hotel members are friendly and helpful. Good room facilities, beatiful bathroom area and spacious apartments. Outside private pool area is a lovely hidden place.
review 5: We stayed at this beautiful hotel 1 year ago and I still love it! The stay was amazing. The location is very beautiful with a big private pool (which is really private) with an amzing view!! The service was also amazing. Super friendly and supportive! I would love to come back someday!

name: Geranyam Guest House Nusa dua
address: Gg. Darma No.15X, Benoa, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: We have stayed 6 nights four families and entire gest house just for us and friendly staff clean and do bedding every day... Wayan the host is very efficient you can message anytime to get quick answers... Pool, AC rooms and little kitchen, garden are well maintained. Love to go back there again.
review 2: Everything was great.Very friendly people.We stay 6 days.Very clean house and swimming pool.One of the best choices in Bali
review 3:
Great Villa! Very good value for the price, everything is clean, there is a big swimming pool, the staff is very kind and always here to help.
Thank you for the stay.
review 4: Great villa, clean rooms, nice swimming pool, and smart TV in all six villas.
review 5:
The place is really clean and beautiful, the beds are comfy and bathrooms are clean, great value for the price !
Thank you very much

name: CV Ulun Danu Trans - Sewa Mobil di Bali
address: Perum Giri Cluster, Jl. Taman Giri Gg. Lingga Yoni No.5, Benoa, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Best experience you can expect from a Rental! WA admin responded immediately, easy & efficient process, on time delivery, reasonable price, and the Xenia Manual unit i rented was sparkling clean.

Minor suggestion, it would be great if the WA reg form can be polished to look more professional, fix all typo and use effective words. It was a bit fishy tbh, but as i was not required to pay DP/Booking Fee i'd decided to just try and thankfully it is great.
review 2:
Service is unfriendly and complicated. We got a car where the machine is shaking and noisy, but they claim it‚Äôs alright and just a rubber slip.

When we request for a change, they make it very complicated and demand us to go to the main office (even though we have arrived at the garage) to sort out some paperworks. Admin WA also forward us to three different people so it‚Äôs very hard to ask for assistance.

On the return day, they demand extra money because of scratches that were there beforehand. Also very rude.

Please pay attention to your service.
review 3: Price is good, car is good. But the service can be more friendly, hand over can be done more polite, pick up also rude just left in a rush fast speed without saying anything and we did not even have a chance to give tips since the pick up after work hour. Couple times missed communication and not complete information to customer.
review 4: Great service, eventhough the Whatsapp Admin less responsive but their service are reliable. Booked Daihatsu Ayla for a cheaper price, they give me Toyota Agya Instead. Definitely use their service another time üçª
review 5: Don' t ever rent car from this place. Be very very careful. Make sure you video every detail of the car IF you decide to rent from this place. üò©

name: Ayam Bakar Bali Tulen Taman Giri
address: Jl. Taman Giri No.39, Benoa, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Local taste of special chicken grill but very limited parking and the place too small. Recommend who love balinese cuisine.
review 2: Taste is good and price is make sense in the neigbourhood. The take away using steorofoam box and they did not provide plastik bag, just make sure you baring your own shopping bag. They said if you eat there you can have more rice, but for sitting there too long the area is not recomended. The honey roasted chicken came with 2 kind of sambal. Sambal matah and sambal biasa, Taste very good. The chicken very tender.
review 3: Really tasty grilled chicken with traditional sambal sauce at a very affordable price.
review 4: Good food good taste.. best place to order take away as for dine in, the place didn't have proper parking area.
review 5: Great traditional Ayam, spicy and choice menue. Good value and fast service.

name: Kuta Rental Sewa Mobil di Bali
address: Jl. Taman Giri Cluster, Gang 2, Banjar Mumbul, Jl. Nusa Dua No.166, Benoa, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia
review 1: Found cockroaches on day 1, and found other 3 similar cars also (witnessed by 2 staff). They wont give upgrade or clean subtitution.
review 2:
They have some pros and cons:

Pros:
- Competitive price
- Fast response admin
- Detail to documented previous dents and scratches

Cons:
- Admins and drop-off staff were not able to coordinate properly. In my case they drop the car an hour earlier even though it was very clear that we agreed to meet at 7pm, had to rush and reschedule some plans because of this.
- On the return date, i was late for one hour than the booking time (7pm) but they charged 2hours late fee because of the miss-coordination they did themselves.
- Drop-off staff was also late for an hour, had to wait and paid him separate drop-off fees. So in total, i was late for just an hour from the booking time but i had to pay almost half the rent fees. I don‚Äôt mind to pay but its a disappointing experience.
- On top of that, the car was rented with empty tank (i even had to pay 100k in advance to the drop-off staff because they need to put some petrol on the car), but the when i put a full tank on it (which cost 400k) they refused to compensate it at all. I understand its not really their fault (i should‚Äôve known better) but it would‚Äôve been nice for them to do so, as they rented it with a completely empty tank and required us to pay petrol in advance. Which i never experienced in any other car rental company.
review 3:
- drop off staff is not contactable after the landing time, even though we‚Äôre still waiting for luggage but we still want to hear an info right?
- the free pickup location is at the airport, but the drop off staff was ASKED for their transport fee (Gojek fare). When we asked the admin, the admin literally said ‚Äòseikhlasnya aja‚Äô. Quite different?
- the car booked was ‚ÄòNew Brio Matic‚Äô but the Brio comes was from 2019 and the car is so meeeehhhh. The indicator somehow not working (the fuel status, sometimes the hand break indicator, and the transmission). Which VERY IMPORTANT indicator.
- the admin is NOT HELPFUL AND NOT POLITE AT ALL.
- NEVER EVER booked in this rent again near the future.
review 4:
The experience was really bad. The staff and car quality were really bad.

Some indicators on the car were broken :
- fuel indicator not updating even though I already fill it up twice,
- air bag indicator always on
- and the accelerator pedal not responsive and causing car going backwards when I stop at ascending road (even not steep)

The staff and admin are rude when we are complaining about the service.

Really really not recommended.
review 5:
Very bad service and not recommended to rent a car here.
I wanted to rent, I was asked for a booking fee first, but when we arrived, the car was different from what we order.

They were more than 1 hour late in delivering the car, disrupting our schedule.
After arriving, the back door of the car could not be opened, there were many scratches and dents on the car body.
The rear AC is hot.

When we asked why the car didn't match our order, the officer who delivered the car said that the car was still being used by the car owner.
It is very strange to rent out a car where the booking fee has been paid, but the car is still being used by the owner.

When we complained to the admin who we were coordinating for the rental, the admin actually said that the client wasn't just me, if I want to cancel, please cancel.
Very unprofessional.
Very bad service.

name: OYO 3776 Sondara Guest House
address: Jl. Taman Giri Cluster Gg. Darma No.3, Benoa, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
The location near immigration office so not too bad.
The room is spacey and the TV is a bonus.
The bed is not the most comfortable but it's sturdy.

No drinking water is included.
No toilet paper is included.
Kitchen is super dirty.

Check in and check out is not flexible. Even though the host was going to a ceremony and they didn't want to clean the room but there was no flexibility for our check out time. It was 11 am and our next place was flexible for checking in. Not this one though.

Also the location on Google maps it's not accurate.
review 2: I'm usually reluctant to write bad reviews, but this time I can't help it. The room is very dirty and obviously has not been cleaned for a long time. Stains on the bed, dirty towels and a disgusting bathroom with residue in the toilet and mold smell. This is in no way meant to be hostile to the owner or staff, the staff was very friendly. I just strongly encourage you to clean the rooms better.

name: Ketoprak & Gado-Gado Khas JKT
address: Jl. Taman Giri Asri 008, Mumbul, Bualu, Nusa Dua, Benoa, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: This is the real gado2 and ketoprak JKT. the sauce really on point, I think it's the best gado2 and ketoprak in Bali that I ever tasted. The portion is also generous. They offering free delivery service for nearest area around nusa dua and jimbaran. It's very very recommended, it will be worth it to try!!!!!
review 2: Very delicious, best authentic traditional gado-gado and ketoprak around Jimbaran and Bali generally i ever taste.
